first_para: David Michael Gauke (born 8 October 1971) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for South West Hertfordshire and current Financial Secretary to the Treasury.

full.extract: David Michael Gauke (born 8 October 1971) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for South West Hertfordshire and current Financial Secretary to the Treasury.
full.title: David Gauke
